title: Get 35% OFF the Samsung Galaxy Buds FE!
description: Grab them for less than 70 bucks! The post Get 35% OFF the Samsung Galaxy Buds FE! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Grab them for less than 70 bucks!
text: If you’re lafter for a wallet-friendly wireless earbuds, then the Samsung Galaxy Buds FE are undoubtedly easy on the wallet. Part of the Samsung “Fan Edition” range of products, the earbuds are on sale right now for as much as 35% off, bringing down their price down to less than 70 bucks. The Galaxy Buds FE come with all the usual features you’d expect from a modern pair of wireless earbuds, including support for active noise cancellation, voice assistant functions, touch controls, multi-device connectivity, as well as a comfy design and battery life that can last for up to a maximum of 30 hours. You can check them out with the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running.
html:
If you’re lafter for a wallet-friendly wireless earbuds, then the Samsung Galaxy Buds FE are undoubtedly easy on the wallet. Part of the Samsung “Fan Edition” range of products, the earbuds are on sale right now for as much as 35% off, bringing down their price down to less than 70 bucks.

The Galaxy Buds FE come with all the usual features you’d expect from a modern pair of wireless earbuds, including support for active noise cancellation, voice assistant functions, touch controls, multi-device connectivity, as well as a comfy design and battery life that can last for up to a maximum of 30 hours.
